item.title: 企业也不希望选举地图出现 "格子化 "现象
item.description:
一个全国性的企业领袖联盟表示，政治中的垄断与商业中的垄断一样问题重重。【原文：

A national coalition of corporate leaders says monopolies in politics are as problematic as they are in business.

】

item.title: 面对美国风力发电场停建，Equinor 向 Orsted 提供见解
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统的政府下令停止在美国一个几乎完工的海上风电场的建设后，持有Orsted A/S公司10%股份的挪威能源公司Equinor ASA正在与这家丹麦风电开发商分享经验教训。【原文：Equinor ASA, the Norwegian energy company that owns a 10% holding in Orsted A/S, is sharing lessons-learned with the Danish wind developer after President Donald Trump’s administration ordered construction halted on an almost-finished offshore wind farm in the US.】

item.title: 德国商业前景意外创 2022 年以来新高
item.description: 在欧盟与美国达成贸易协议后，德国企业的信心出人意料地提高到了 2022 年以来的最高点，尽管有些企业批评美国提高关税。【原文：Confidence among German firms unexpectedly improved to the highest since 2022 after the European Union struck a trade deal with the US, despite some criticizing higher tariffs.】

item.title: 汤姆-巴尔金谈为何中央银行现在处于困难模式
item.description:
在杰克逊霍尔与里士满联储主席交谈。【原文：

Talking to Richmond's Fed president at Jackson Hole.

】

item.title: 奇货可居：汤姆-巴尔金谈为何政策现在处于 "困难模式"（播客）
item.description: 里士满联邦储备银行行长汤姆-巴金（Tom Barkin）认为，中央银行在很多时候都是直截了当的。有时显然需要降息，有时显然需要加息。有时显然需要加息。其他时候，一切都很顺利，央行行长们也没有什么好担心的。但现在，情况并非如此简单。劳动力市场出现了疲软迹象。但也有理由担心通胀压力会再次增大。在这种情况下【原文：According to Richmond Federal Reserve Bank President Tom Barkin, much of the time central banking is straightforward. Sometimes it’s clear that rate cuts are needed. Sometimes it’s clear that rate hikes are needed. Other times everything is going great, and central bankers don’t have much to worry about. Right now though, things are not straightforward. There are signs of labor market softening. But also there are reasons to be concerned that inflation pressure is building yet again. In times li】

item.title: S.瓷砖制造商称非洲政策导致工业衰退
item.description: 陶瓷生产商和零售商 Italtile Ltd. 说，由于缺乏对当地制造业的支持，南非正在失去在邻国的市场份额。【原文：South Africa is losing market share in neighboring countries because of a lack of support for local manufacturing, ceramics manufacturer and retailer Italtile Ltd. said.】

item.title: 交易商关注供应信号和乌克兰问题进展，欧洲天然气下跌
item.description: 欧洲天然气价格在上周上涨 8%后走低，交易商在等待短期供应前景的新信号以及结束乌克兰战争的进展。【原文：European natural gas prices edged lower after last week’s 8% gain, with traders awaiting fresh signals on short-term supply prospects as well as progress on ending the war in Ukraine.】

item.title: 大亨郑氏家族的 CTF Services 据称将停止出售价值 20 亿美元的收费公路
item.description: 亿万富豪郑氏家族的基础设施部门已经停止了出售中国境内价值约 20 亿美元的一系列道路的计划，熟悉此事的人士称，在此之前，双方已就可能的出售事宜进行了数月的谈判。【原文：The infrastructure arm of the billionaire Cheng family has halted a plan to sell a collection of roads in China worth about $2 billion, people familiar with the matter said, after months of talks on a possible disposal.】

item.title: 美元基差溢价暗示国债吸引力减弱
item.description: 美元在货币衍生品中的溢价几乎消失殆尽，这表明外国对美国债务的需求正在减弱。【原文：The premium the dollar commands in currency derivatives is nearly gone, one measure that hints at weakening foreign demand for US debt.】

item.title: Galaxy、Jump、Multicoin 寻求 10 亿美元购买 Solana 代币
item.description: 银河数字公司（Galaxy Digital）、Multicoin Capital 和 Jump Crypto 正在与潜在的支持者商谈筹集约 10 亿美元来积累 Solana，这将是专门用于数字代币的最大金库。【原文：Galaxy Digital, Multicoin Capital and Jump Crypto are in talks with potential backers about raising roughly $1 billion to accumulate Solana, in what would be the largest treasury dedicated to the digital token.】

item.title: 美国智囊团称沙特千兆项目调整是积极的
item.description: 据一家总部位于华盛顿的智囊团称，沙特阿拉伯对其大型千兆项目的重新调整，包括推迟或缩减其中一些项目的规模，很可能会得到投资者的青睐。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s recalibration of its huge giga projects — including delaying or downsizing some of them — will probably be viewed favourably by investors, according to a Washington-based think-tank.】

item.title: 据说 TPG 正在考虑出售亚洲学校运营商 XCL Education
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，TPG 公司正在考虑出售东南亚学校运营商 XCL 教育公司，并已吸引了业内同行和收购公司的初步兴趣。【原文：TPG Inc. is considering selling Southeast Asian school operator XCL Education and has attracted preliminary interest from industry peers and buyout firms, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 联合信贷银行在德国商业银行的实际股份增至 26
item.description: 意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）已将其在德国商业银行股份公司（Commerzbank AG）的持股比例扩大至约 26%，巩固了该公司作为德国竞争对手最大投资者的地位。【原文：UniCredit SpA has expanded its equity stake in Commerzbank AG to about 26%, buttressing the firm as the German rival’s biggest investor.】

item.title: 南非计划调整场外衍生品市场以遏制风险
item.description: 南非金融监管机构正在制定场外衍生品市场的新规则，要求某些产品必须由中央交易对手进行清算，以提高透明度和降低风险。【原文：South Africa’s financial watchdog is preparing new rules for the over-the-counter derivatives market that will require certain products to be cleared by a central counterparty to improve transparency and reduce risk.】

item.title: 波兰收购芬兰监控卫星制造商 Iceye 的股份
item.description: 波兰收购了芬兰私营先进地球观测卫星制造商 Iceye Oy 的股份。【原文：Poland acquired a stake in privately-held Iceye Oy, the Finnish maker of advanced Earth-observation satellites.】

item.title: Orsted 将继续出售股份以避免危机
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普总统的政府下令停止一个几乎完工的海上风电场的建设后，Orsted A/S表示将继续执行出售股票的计划，以控制日益严重的危机。【原文：Orsted A/S said it will continue with plans to sell shares as it tries to contain a growing crisis that worsened after President Donald Trump’s administration ordered construction to halt on an almost-finished offshore wind farm.】

item.title: 阿布扎比马斯达尔公司为屋顶太阳能公司股权寻找买家
item.description: 阿布扎比最大的可再生能源公司正在洽谈出售其持有的屋顶太阳能公司 Emerge Energy 50% 的股份，因为该公司希望将资源集中用于更大的项目。【原文：Abu Dhabi’s biggest renewables company is in talks to sell its 50% stake in rooftop solar firm Emerge Energy, as it looks to focus its resources on bigger projects.】

item.title: 中国政府收紧政策后中国稀土企业反弹
item.description: 中国稀土生产商周一大涨，此前中国政府制定了对稀土行业实施更严格管控的计划，而稀土行业在中国与美国的贸易战中发挥了至关重要的作用。【原文：China’s rare earths producers surged on Monday, after the government fleshed out plans for stricter controls on an industry that has played a crucial role in the country’s trade war with the US.】

item.title: 印度央行行长称印度央行并未 "忽视 "经济增长
item.description: 印度央行行长桑杰-马尔霍特拉（Sanjay Malhotra）周一表示，尽管稳定物价仍是印度央行的首要任务，但印度央行并未 "忽视 "其增长目标。【原文：India’s central bank has not “lost sight” of its growth objective, even as price stability remains its primary mandate, Governor Sanjay Malhotra said on Monday.】

item.title: 据说保诚对瀚亚投资 30 亿美元的审查陷入僵局
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，保诚集团（Prudential Plc）对瀚亚投资公司（Eastspring Investments）的审查，包括可能出售股份或为该资产管理公司建立合伙关系，由于对估值和交易结构的担忧而停滞不前。【原文：Prudential Plc’s review of Eastspring Investments, which included possibly selling a stake or forming a partnership for the asset manager, has stalled amid concerns over valuation and deal structure, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 需求强劲，产量减少，玉米升至本月最高点
item.description: 芝加哥玉米跃升至一个月来的最高点，原因是强劲的需求和低于预期的产量前景继续支撑着价格。【原文：Chicago corn jumped to the highest in a month as strong demand and a lower-than-expected production outlook continued to support prices.】

item.title: 印尼在买家反对下废除煤炭定价规则
item.description: 在买家反对今年早些时候推出的一项制度后，印尼废除了迫使矿商按政府确定的水平出售煤炭和矿物的规定。【原文：Indonesia scrapped rules forcing miners to sell coal and minerals at government-determined levels after buyers pushed back against a system introduced earlier this year.】

item.title: 布伦特对中东石油标价出现罕见贴水
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）严厉打击俄罗斯的原油产量，并且预计今年晚些时候将出现原油供应过剩，全球原油基准布伦特原油的交易价格罕见地低于中东原油。【原文：Brent, the global crude oil benchmark, is trading at a rare discount to its Middle Eastern counterpart, as President Donald Trump cracks down on Russian barrels and a glut is forecast for later in the year.】

item.title: 发行商关注利差收窄和美联储的暗示，亚洲债券谈判升温
item.description: 在对美国进一步降息的预期日益增强之际，一些亚洲借款人本周开始与投资者就美元债券交易进行谈判，旨在锁定一些数十年来最窄的信贷息差。【原文：Several Asian borrowers are opening talks with investors this week on dollar bond deals, aiming to lock in some of the tightest credit spreads seen in decades amid growing expectations for further US interest rate cuts.】

item.title: 新加坡核心通胀率降至四个月低点
item.description: 新加坡 7 月份的主要通胀指标降温，增幅为四个月来最慢。【原文：Singapore’s key inflation gauge in July cooled to the slowest pace of gains in four months.】

item.title: 中国电子商务过剩在拉美遭遇阻力
item.description:
该地区开始对来自其一边倒贸易伙伴的大量廉价商品征税。【原文：

The region is starting to tax the flood of cheap stuff from its lopsided trade partner. 

】

item.title: 中国加大房地产支持力度，上海放宽购房规定
item.description: 中国金融中心上海放宽了购房规定，这是当局遏制中国长期房地产危机的最新尝试。【原文：China’s financial hub of Shanghai eased home-buying rules in the latest attempt by authorities to contain the nation’s prolonged property crisis.】

item.title: 中国房地产股因预期将出台更多刺激政策而大涨
item.description: 中国开发商股价周一上涨，中国万科集团股份有限公司（China Vanke Co.【原文：Chinese developers’ shares rallied on Monday, with China Vanke Co. hitting a six-month high, on expectations authorities will unveil more measures to support the nation’s slumping property market.】

item.title: Gamuda 与 Gentari 合作开发 1.5 千兆瓦太阳能项目
item.description: 基础设施公司Gamuda Bhd.和清洁能源公司Gentari Sdn.将联合开发约1.5千兆瓦的可再生能源容量，以满足马来西亚超大规模数据中心的电力需求。【原文：Infrastructure firm Gamuda Bhd. and clean energy company Gentari Sdn. will jointly develop approximately 1.5 gigawatts of renewable energy capacity as they seek to meet power demand for hyperscale data centers in Malaysia.】

item.title: 随着野味消费增长，尼日利亚医生担心疫情爆发
item.description:
从蝙蝠到大象，吃这些东西曾经主要是一种农村现象，现在在城市也越来越流行。【原文：

Once largely a rural phenomenon, eating everything from bats to elephants is increasingly popular in cities too.

】
